summary: This document is an email chain from January 2020 between attorney Teri Gibbs and law enforcement officials. Gibbs, representing a client, offers to share documents and information related to Ghislaine Maxwell and a witness account of Prince Andrew's interactions with an unnamed individual. The emails discuss scheduling calls to provide an attorney proffer and share documents, including a list of office numbers used by Maxwell's employee from 2003-2007.

persons.name: Teri Gibbs
persons.context: Attorney representing a client who possesses documents and information related to Ghislaine Maxwell and witnessed Prince Andrew's interactions. She is coordinating with law enforcement to share information and schedule interviews.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as the person from whom the attorney's client possesses documents and email correspondence. Also referenced as the employer of an individual from 2003-2007.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: The Duke of York. The attorney states her client witnessed Prince Andrew's interactions with an unnamed individual, which is the subject of the proposed information sharing and interview.

persons.name: Lisa Bloom
persons.context: Mentioned as being available with Teri Gibbs for a phone or video conference regarding the witness information about Prince Andrew.

persons.name: Colleen Mullen
persons.context: Recipient (copied) on several emails in the chain, involved in the coordination to receive information from the attorney's client.

connections.description: Gibbs represents a client who possesses documents and correspondence from Ghislaine Maxwell.
Gibbs is offering her client's witness account of Prince Andrew's interactions to law enforcement.
Both are attorneys mentioned as being available together for a conference call regarding the witness information.
Gibbs is corresponding with Mullen (likely law enforcement) to schedule calls and share information from her client.
The document implies a connection through the witness account of Prince Andrew's interactions, which the client of Gibbs observed.

events.title: Email Sharing Office Numbers
events.description: Teri Gibbs sends an email attaching a list of office numbers used by an employee of Ghislaine Maxwell from 2003-2007.

events.title: Initial Offer of Witness Information
events.description: Teri Gibbs first contacts law enforcement to offer a client who witnessed Prince Andrew's interactions with an unnamed individual.

events.title: Scheduling of Attorney Proffer Calls
events.description: A series of emails between Teri Gibbs and law enforcement officials to schedule phone/video conferences to provide an attorney proffer regarding the client's information.

keyFacts: An attorney (Teri Gibbs) represents a client who possesses documents and email correspondence from Ghislaine Maxwell.
The same client witnessed Prince Andrew's interactions with an unnamed individual, which the attorney offered to report to law enforcement.
The attorney shared a document listing office phone numbers used by an employee of Ghislaine Maxwell during the period 2003-2007.
The email chain shows coordination between a private attorney and law enforcement (FBI/DOJ) in early 2020 regarding potential evidence and witness testimony.
Attorney Lisa Bloom is also involved in the proposed discussions about the witness information concerning Prince Andrew.
